title: President Donald J. Trump is Fighting to Prevent Human Trafficking at the Southern Border â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
February 1, 2019
This is an urgent humanitarian issue. My Administration is committed to leveraging every resource we have to confront this threat, to support the victims and survivors, and to hold traffickers accountable for their heinous crimes.
						President Donald J. Trump					HUMANITARIAN CRISIS AT THE BORDER: There is a humanitarian crisis at the southern border as human traffickers victimize countless women and children. MORAL OBLIGATION: Democrats and Republicans have a moral obligation to build a wall to protect children and women from human trafficking.ADMINISTRATION PRIORITY: President Trump has made stopping human trafficking an Administration priority.
